| metadata 
	name="TEST_QUERY"
	firstname = "Hana"
	value = 42
| record
	[NAME, VALUE]
	[meta(firstname), meta(value)]
	["Rakesh", 88]

| filter NAME == "Hana"
; 


| source random records = 10
; 


| mimic name="TEST_QUERY" remove=["filter"]
# test removing last command in query(keeps Rakesh), & keep metadata(keeps Hana), result:
#  NAME    	VALUE
#  Hana		42
#  Rakesh	88
